module.title: Unix system module
module.description: Various system related checks, such as CPU load, process state and memory.
module.name: CheckSystem

todo_commands.check_cpu: Check that the load of the CPU(s) are within bounds.
todo_commands.check_service: Check the state of one or more of the computer services.
todo_commands.check_process: Check state/metrics of one or more of the processes running on the computer.
todo_commands.check_pagefile: Check the size of the system pagefile(s).

commands.check_uptime: Check time since last server re-boot.
commands.check_memory: Check free/used memory on the system.
commands.check_os_version: Check the version of the underlaying OS.
